question: In which country, "Krkonose National Park" is located?
explanation: Krkonose National Park is a national park located in the Czech Republic. It lies in the Krkonose Mountain Ranges. It is also a Biosphere Reserve according to the UNESCO Man and Biosphere Reserve Programme. It lies adjacent to Karkonosze National Park of Poland. This national park houses Mount Snezka which is the highest mountain in the Czech republic.
